original: intros Hlim. unfold is_lim in *. intros eps Heps. destruct (Hlim eps Heps) as [delta Hdelta]. exists delta. intros x' Hx'. apply Hdelta in Hx'. unfold R_lt in *. rewrite <- sqrt_sqr. apply sqrt_lt_1_alt. apply Rlt_le_trans with (r2 := f x'). apply sqrt_lt_1_alt in Hx'. apply Rsqr_incr_1. rewrite <- Rsqr_abs. rewrite Rsqr_sqrt. rewrite <- Rsqr_abs. rewrite Rsqr_abs. apply Rle_0_sqr. auto. apply Rlt_le. apply Rle_lt_trans with (r2 := x'). apply Rabs_pos. apply Hx'.
